name: Beat-Or-Treat
description:
A fun game where you beat up kids to collect candy and try to avoid getting run over!

Controls:

  • Keyboard: 
    • WASD to move
    • E to punch kids
  • Controller:
    • Left Stick / D-Pad to move
    • South Face Button to punch kids

Team:

  • Marco - Fearless Leader, Loving Father, Creating, Music, and 2d Art.
  • John - *T-Poses in programming*
  • JP - Beat up Marco in Super Smash Brothers Ultimate, Level Designer & 3D Artist
  • Agustin - 3d arting
  • Marcus - 2d child artist
  • Colby - 2d child artist
